ygData.subject: Re: Re: What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: Correct if I m wrong but Cured Silk Gi has the SAME appearance as Shiverback So it s the Planar Armor look too. I think Cured Silk Gi looks better than
ygData.messageBody:
Correct if I'm wrong but

Cured Silk Gi has the SAME appearance as Shiverback

So it's the Planar Armor look too.

I think Cured Silk Gi looks better than leather.


- Okansu, lvl 36 Monk (who is more stat based)
Blood Inferno guild
Brell

----- Original Message -----
From: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
> Subject: Re: Re: What to buy?
>
> Cured silk makes you look like a monk? I would have to disagree, what
> makes us look like monks are the fact that we look like newbies. I
> personally much prefer foreman's tunic. Here is a comparison
>
> Cured Silk Gi
> 8ac
> 0.1wt
>
> Foreman's Tunic
> 10ac
> +3str +3dex
> WEIGHTLESS
